name: GH Actions Matrix OS/Node+pnpm 最小

files.template:
name: CI
on: [push]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [ubuntu-latest, macos-latest]
        node: [18, 20]
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with: { node-version: ${{ matrix.node }} }
      - run: corepack enable && pnpm -v || echo 'pnpm'
